text: Hello... I'm trying to implement a "Load More" button for a HubDB page where every click on the button will load and display a series of 10 row sets. I have tried various approaches using jquery, but couldn't achieve this and all the info is always on display. Has anyone implemented this ? Is there any simple way to achieve this ?

If your using the api. Then it is just an endpoint that you have to count up the offset to get the next set. If it's just hubl then you need to use a query string in the URL and count that up from there.
